overview: Ajeet Singh is Co-Founder and Chief Products Officer of Nutanix. Prior to Nutanix, Ajeet was Senior Director of Product Management at Aster Data, leading multiple product launches, forging strategic partnerships and playing a key role in positioning the company as a visionary on Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for Data Warehousing. Prior to Aster Data, Ajeet worked at Oracle where he was part of the early team that defined Oracle’s cloud computing strategy. Previously, Ajeet held various strategic and operational positions at Honeywell, i2 Technologies and PricewaterhouseCoopers over his 11-year career spanning multiple geographies and functional areas. Ajeet holds an MBA from the Indian Institute of Management (IIM), Calcutta and a Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kanpur, where he graduated at the top of his class.
